price: 4. Mpe (bato ya makkah) bakamuaki ete mokebisi kati na bango akomela bango, mpe bapengwi balobaki: Oyó azali nganga mpe moto ya lokuta.
arabic: وَعَجِبُوٓاْ أَن جَآءَهُم مُّنذِرٞ مِّنۡهُمۡۖ وَقَالَ ٱلۡكَٰفِرُونَ هَٰذَا سَٰحِرٞ كَذَّابٌ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.
